channel.title: 3.3.x on DB Browser for SQLite
channel.description: Recent content in 3.3.x on DB Browser for SQLite

item.title: Released new v3.3.1 .dmg for OSX
item.description: Released a new version 3.3.1 .dmg for OSX. The previous one had an old SQLite version in it.

item.title: Version 3.3.1 released
item.description: Version 3.3.1 released, using the new name. No functional changes from 3.3.0.

item.title: Version 3.3.0 released
item.description: Version 3.3.0 released. Several bug fixes and improvements, a recommended upgrade.
